memberdef.argsstring: (const LV2UI_Descriptor *descriptor, const char *plugin_uri, const char *bundle_path, LV2UI_Write_Function write_function, LV2UI_Controller controller, LV2UI_Widget *widget, const LV2_Feature *const *features)
memberdef.name: instantiate

memberdef.argsstring: (LV2UI_Handle handle, uint32_t port_index, uint32_t buffer_size, uint32_t format, const void *buffer)
memberdef.name: port_event

detaileddescription.para: This is the entry point to a UI library, which works in the same way as lv2_descriptor() but for UIs rather than plugins.
